column2: an A.M. Eatery////Everything in this place feels sterile and market research driven
column3: from the faux retro decor to the menu to the food. None of the coffee items were very good
column4: a far step behind many of our local establishments. The food itself was underwhelming
column7: and chocolate chip) all tasting rather bland. Everything looked like it was prepackaged and heated up for. I basically had a glorified Big Breakfast from McDonalds.
